entry.question: Does Micro Capacitor work on Thrust's ability? Probable not but I want to make sure.
entry.answer: You are correct. It does not!

entry.question: Would Micro Capacitor work for Thrust even though Thrust doesnâ€™t have the tap symbol on his card?
entry.answer: No, the tap symbol must be present on a card for Micro Capacitor to apply to it.
